content: i offer free knitting tutorials on my youtube channel 1 pop over and subscribe and like my facebook page 2 thanks i hope you enjoy this pattern my grandmother dorothy always knit these for her 5 grandkids and i now use it for my 6 kids i love it and i hope you will too her pattern called for a 4 strand yarn which would be fingering weight but i believe she always used worsted and that is what i use also i actually just knit a pair using 3 ply yarn patons classic wool merino and just made sure to use the larger needle size and knit a couple sizes larger and they came out great this pattern is really flexible and the mittens always come out awesome my most favorite wool to use now is cestari so nice and durable doesn t pill much and is super warm 1 http //www youtube com/bridgetmckenzie 2 https //www facebook com/pages/the-knitting-maniac/213770105346857
